targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM
    (SELECT /*old_version_see_0416*/ json_extract(stats,"$[8]") AS `cu`,
         `statement`, statement_id, `duration`, `duration`/1e9 sec, `status` , `query_type` , `request_at` , system.statement_info.response_at,
         `account`, `user` , `database` , `transaction_id` , `session_id` , `rows_read` , `bytes_scan` , `result_count`, `aggr_count`,
         `sql_source_type`, `err_code`, `error`, `node_uuid`, `stats`
    FROM system.statement_info
    WHERE $__timeFilter(request_at)
            AND system.statement_info.account = "$account"
            AND ("$sql_source_type" = "'ALL'" OR sql_source_type IN ($sql_source_type))
            AND ($status = "ALL" OR status = $status)
            AND ("$node_uuid" = "" OR node_uuid = "$node_uuid")
            AND ("$session_id" = "" OR session_id = "$session_id")
            AND ("$statement_id" = "" OR statement_id = "$statement_id")
            AND ($filter_condition)
            AND ($query_type="ALL" OR query_type = $query_type)) t
ORDER BY  $order_condition LIMIT $limit;
select * from processlist() p where p.account = "$account";

select FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(concat(left(collecttime, 16), ":59"))) as collecttime, sum(value)/4 as value from system_metrics.server_connections where account = "$account" and $__timeFilter(collecttime) group by left(collecttime, 16);

SELECT * FROM
    (SELECT /*old_version_see_0416*/ json_extract(stats,"$[8]") AS `cu`,
         `statement`, statement_id, `duration`, `duration`/1e9 sec, `status` , `query_type` , `request_at` , system.statement_info.response_at,
         `account`, `user` , `database` , `transaction_id` , `session_id` , `exec_plan`
    FROM system.statement_info
    WHERE $__timeFilter(request_at)
            AND ("$statement_id" != "" AND statement_id = "$statement_id")
            AND system.statement_info.account = "$account"
            AND ("$sql_source_type" = "'ALL'" OR sql_source_type IN ($sql_source_type))
            AND ($status = "ALL" OR status = $status)
            AND ("$node_uuid" = "" OR node_uuid = "$node_uuid")
            AND ("$session_id" = "" OR session_id = "$session_id")
            AND ($query_type="ALL" OR query_type = $query_type)) t
ORDER BY  $order_condition LIMIT $limit;

select task_id taskID, task_metadata_id taskMetadataID, task_runner node_uuid, FROM_UNIXTIME(create_at/1e3) as create_time, FROM_UNIXTIME(end_at/1e3) as end_time, IF(task_status=0, 'NOT Start', IF(task_status=1, "Running", IF(task_status=2, "Failed", "Unknown"))) taskStatus, * from mo_task.sys_async_task
where task_metadata_id like 'Storage%' order by create_at desc limit 1;

select * from system.statement_info where $__timeFilter(request_at) and user in (select user from system.statement_info where $__timeFilter(request_at) and `database` = 'mo_task' order by request_at desc limit 1) order by request_at desc limit $limit;

select * from system.statement_info where $__timeFilter(request_at) and user in (select user from system.statement_info where $__timeFilter(request_at) and `database` = 'mo_task' order by request_at desc limit 1) and status = 'Failed' order by request_at desc limit 10;

list.name: query_type
list.query: DQL, DDL, DML, DCL, TCL, Other

list.label: order
list.name: order_condition
list.query: request_at DESC, cu DESC, duration DESC

list.description: pls use " (double quote), ' (single quote) not work well
list.name: filter_condition
